name: Mini Reaper
storyline: On a meta level, the game is about wanting to play a 3d platformer that you are nostalgic for and finding a haunted copy of it online, then trying to avoid the ghost in the machine. The story of the fictional in world retro game "Mini Reaper" is that of taking on the role of a minion for the grim reaper, who is taking a vacation, leaving the minion to collect souls in his absence.
summary: Mini Reaper is a short indie chaser-horror 3D platformer themed after retro game creepypasta and game emulation. The gameplay revolves around collecting souls in a mansion while avoiding the chasing monster.
